hero.title: Professional Cleaning Services
hero.text: Delivering excellence in every clean. Transform your space with our trusted team of professionals.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: We offer a wide range of cleaning services tailored to meet your needs.

descriptions.residential: Thorough cleaning of all living spaces, kitchens, and bathrooms.
descriptions.commercial: Professional cleaning for workplaces to maintain a healthy environment.
descriptions.windows: Crystal-clear windows for a brighter, more inviting space.
descriptions.carpet: Deep cleaning to remove stains, dirt, and allergens from carpets.
descriptions.housekeeping: Regular maintenance to keep your home or office spotless.
descriptions.deep: Intensive cleaning for every corner of your space.

whyUs.title: Why Choose Us
whyUs.subtitle: We stand out from the competition with our exceptional service and attention to detail.

features.qualityDesc: Our team is trained and experienced in delivering high-quality cleaning services.
features.ecoDesc: We use safe, non-toxic cleaning products that are effective and environmentally friendly.
features.flexibleDesc: We work around your schedule to provide convenient service times.
features.satisfactionDesc: Your satisfaction is our priority. We guarantee you'll love the results.

booking.title: Book Your Service
booking.subtitle: Select an available date for your cleaning service
